article_title: How Obamacare can end bloated CEO pay
article_text:

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Sarah Anderson

twitter.title: How Obamacare can end bloated CEO pay
twitter.description: Wellpoint CEO Angela Braly saw the writing on the wall in the summer of 2012. Slumping profits were prompting one investor after another to call for her ouster. So Braly decided to walk out the doo...

article_metadata.keywords: ceo pay wellpoint angela braly occupy wall street tom harkin david camp
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Angela Braly, CEO Pay, David Camp, Tom Harkin, WellPoint
article_metadata.news_keywords: CEO pay WellPoint Angela Braly Occupy Wall Street Tom Harkin David Camp
article_metadata.sailthru.title: How Obamacare can end bloated CEO pay
article_metadata.description: A section of President Obama’s signature health care reform law closes the ‘performance pay’ loophole for health insurance companies. Now it’s time to apply this across corporate America.
